includedAssets.title: The Dundies
includedAssets.synopsis: Unlike the rest of the office, Michael can't hide his excitement as the annual 'Dundies' awards ceremony approaches.

includedAssets.synopsis: As the threat of downsizing looms, Michael attempts to keep the staff in good spirits, while Jim struggles with his feelings for Pam. Second season of the Emmy award-winning US comedy.

includedIn.title: The Office
includedIn.shortSynopsis: A documentary crew record the daily lives of the dysfunctional staff of a Pennsylvania paper company in the hope of learning more about office life.
